newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT- A. Brown cuts Flextronics.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT- A. Brown cuts Flextronics.

text.p: -- Alex. Brown said analyst Jim Savage cut Flextronics International Ltd to buy from strong buy.
-- The analyst was traveling and not immediately available to comment.

-- The stock took a nose-dive Wednesday morning, falling 9-3/4 to 27-1/2, after the company announced a series of restructuring steps that includes doubling manufacturing capacity but closing or downsizing two plants.

-- It said it expects to be "modestly profitable" in the current December quarter and in the fourth fiscal quarter ending in March and plans to take a $5 to $7 million restructuring charge over an unspecified period.
